description: This set of 4 Foldable drawer organizers is flexible to fit your home organization needs. With 4 different sizes and a diversity of compartments, you can use this to make getting dressed quick and easy! The non-woven polypropylene fabric style makes it easy to guard against moisture, moths, mold, and more! Easy to clean! Wipe down with a wet towel and hang to dry. Be sure that all folds are wiped down to remove any residual moisture! Can also be sprayed with disinfectant, or spot cleaned with paper towels.
